import re

def fix_xml_ampersands(xml_str):
    """Replace all lone '&' characters by '&' in XML"""
    xml_str_interp = re.sub(r'&(?!(?:[a-z]+|#[0-9]+|#x[0-9a-f]+);)', '&', xml_str)
    return xml_str_interp
